demos.text: I am bringing my whole family back next time.
The i5 blows my desktop out of the water when it comes to rendering videos.
Went there and had a combination of different seafood dishes and appetizers.
Save your money and go for a better device.

signature.instructions: Given a text review, identify and extract the specific aspects or features of the laptop or netbook that are mentioned, such as battery life, GUI, or applications.
